title: Pesara Laddu | Yellow Moong Dal Laddu 😍
content:
Sweet recipe: Pesara Laddu  Servings:15 Duration: 20 minutes  A delicious South Indian sweet recipe is made with five simple ingredients they are easily available at home 🏡 . It’s easy, tasty and healthy Laddu can serve to any age group, people who have sweet tooth won’t stop eating these delicate Indian laddus 😍 Today, I prepared one of the famous South Indian Laddu is Pesara Laddu 😋 which contains moong dal, sugar, ghee . You can also make these laddus by using jaggery powder instead sugar. Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Yellow Moong Dal - 200 gms - Dry Roasted for 5 mins
  • Sugar - 120 gms - grounded into smooth powder
  • Ghee - 80 ml
  • Cashew Nuts - 10 - chopped and fried in ghee
  • Cardamom powder - 1/8 teaspoon
Procedure:
  • In a pan add ghee, grounded moong Dal, sugar and cashew nuts
  • Saute 5 mins over medium heat , you can smell the aromatic flavor
  • Turn off heat and transfer onto plate
  • Let the mixture become cool
  • Make laddus and enjoy your evening 😃
  • Happy Cooking and have a great day ❄️
